Great for a cheap fan for my home gym. A little flimsy looking looking, I wouldn’t have it around small children
Works perfect
Easy assembly, literally had t hooked up and on within 2 minutes. Exactly what I expected.

Went together easy enough. Not too sturdy for a pedestal fan. Does the trick buy feels especially cheap.

I worked in the department that sold fans at Sears for 4 years. This one is maybe slightly below in terms of quality of materials our cheapest fan. It's a cheap fan that works fine. I don't expect it to have a long life though.
Make a weird noise when on rotation
Perfect
Not very sturdy

Very good

Very good fan

Nothing fancy butworks like a charm.
Works well but really loud
Good for the money. Box had been opened and was shipped open. Works well
as advertised
smelled strong from plastic smell.. do not order one..
Really easy to set up and runs great throughout the night

I got what I paid for. The plastic is so flimsy, it is a dollar store quality. Bought two of these and the motor on one of them doesn't run smoothly - it still sends breeze but it does faster and slower motion constantly regardless of the speed choice. Stand is somewhat wobbly. I won't buy a Dyson for a fan but I wouldn't buy this again either.

Box arrived damaged. When I put the fan together, there was a rattling in the motor area as if a piece had broken off. The box was split open. It does work but disappointed. Too much trouble to return it as the box was ripped and dented.
Convient parfaitement
Great fan.
Good product for the price. I buy one every year or 2
It is extremely flimsy, poor quality
Not even 24 hrs of use and already stopped working. Smells like burnt motor and won't turn on anymore.
It worked, it was easy to put together and very happy.
It’s easy to assemble and good for the price. Works very well. It was delivered quickly and happy with it.
Ce produit est parfait côté qualité-prix. Il est facile à assembler, pas trop bruyant. Il fait bien le travail!
Good

Decent quality considering the price
This is a great working fan. Exactly what I wanted. Easy to put together
The pedestal broke within a few days. Not a good product.

it works fine and does what it's supposed to do, but has scuffs and scratch marks on it. the box also didn't come in the greatest shape so that's a bummer since it says in the description that the item is new and i paid for a new item..

Best fan for this price that I've found. Bottom stays together much better than previous cheaper fans that I have had. Plus it fans out and folds in for easy transport.
Maybe the best standing fan you can get at this price.

As advertised

It is really good.
I bought this fan for circulation in a room occupied by two seniors and they love it. The fan stands up anywhere and can be adjusted.
It's good. No problems.
The stand is a little bit filmsy and the pedals come off.. but the fan does its job well so no complaints there

I doubt anyone could make a crappier fan if they tried. Luckily for us it's really just meant for white noise in our bedroom. The last one we bought (cheap junk from Canadian Tire) lasted 10 years and it was literally only shut off to clean it. No way this one lasts a year. The medium setting didn't work right out of the package but it would have been more hassle to return it than it was worth.
Easy enough to put together. Cage blade etc all made of plastic. Works great
Very noisy but if that doesn’t bother u it’s a great fan
I order 3 fans. Easy assembly super quiet and all work great.
Not the best time quality you can find, loud and doesn’t cool the room. Expected to get what I paid for but you could find something much better for the same price. Wouldn’t buy it again
Work perfect
Good pedestal fan. very powerful.
Awesome fan though the parts are not of high quality. It serves the people

It is exactly what I expected. A nice quiet fan to circulate the air.
Good product. The base is wider than you may expect. Fans work well

So far looks good

First time i bought a ventilator, and i'm really glad it was this one.
Not too noisy and exactly what i expected
